allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add interface-specific dispersion curve visualization

- Implement calculate_interface_amplitude function to compute displacement amplitude at specific interfaces
- Update visualization to color dispersion curves based on interface response \(amplitude\)
- Add interface_index parameter to control which interface is analyzed

This allows users to simulate sensor data by highlighting modes that are active at the sensor location.
EOF
\)")
